'''Cloud Retainer's Damasked Device''' is a commemorative event gadget that can be obtained through the [[Of Travels and Treasures: A Thank-You Gift]] [[Event]]. It is claimable via in-game mail.

Cloud Retainer's Damasked Device is not a true gadget and is merely toggled on when equipped, thus regular gadgets can still be used as per normal. Cloud Retainer's Damasked Device will also temporarily disappear when in combat mode.

==Notes==
* It cannot be used at the same time as any other [[Gadget]] of the "Equipment" type.
